00026 SceneManager::SceneManager()
00027 {
00028     nullSceneNode = new SceneNode("nullSceneNode");
00029     rootSceneNode = new SceneNode("rootSceneNode");
00030     cameras["default"] = new Camera("default");
00031     cam = cameras["default"];
00032 }
00033 
00034 SceneManager::~SceneManager()
00035 {
00036     delete nullSceneNode;
00037     delete rootSceneNode;
00038 
00039     while (components.begin() != components.end())
00040         destroyComponent(components.begin()->second, true);
00041 
00042     while (cameras.size() > 1)
00043         destroyCamera(cameras.begin()->second, true);
00044 
00045     cam->removeAllUsers();
00046     cameras.erase(cam->getName());
00047     delete cam;
00048 
00049     while (creators.begin() != creators.end())
00050     {
00051         ComponentCreator* com = creators.begin()->second;
00052         creators.erase(creators.begin()->first);
00053         delete com;
00054     }
00055 
00056     scManager = NULL;
00057 }

00069 SceneNode* SceneManager::createSceneNode(const string& name)
00070 {
00071     if (sceneGraph.find(name) == sceneGraph.end())
00072     {
00073         sceneGraph[name] = new SceneNode(name);
00074         nullSceneNode->attachChildSceneNode(sceneGraph[name]);
00075     }
00076     else
00077         Utils::get()->writeToLog("SceneNode with name [" + name + "] already exists, returning previously existing SceneNode.");
00078     return sceneGraph[name];
00079 }
00080 
00081 SceneNode* SceneManager::createSceneNode(const string& name, hgeVector position, double z, double scale, double rotation)
00082 {
00083     if (sceneGraph.find(name) == sceneGraph.end())
00084     {
00085         sceneGraph[name] = new SceneNode(name);
00086         sceneGraph[name]->setPosition(position);
00087         sceneGraph[name]->setZ(z);
00088         sceneGraph[name]->setScale(scale);
00089         sceneGraph[name]->setRotation(rotation);
00090         nullSceneNode->attachChildSceneNode(sceneGraph[name]);
00091     }
00092     else
00093         Utils::get()->writeToLog("SceneNode with name [" + name + "] already exists, returning previously existing SceneNode.");
00094     return sceneGraph[name];
00095 }

00097 void SceneManager::registerSceneNode(SceneNode* entity)
00098 {
00099     if (sceneGraph.find(entity->getName()) == sceneGraph.end())
00100         sceneGraph[entity->getName()] = entity;
00101     else
00102         Utils::get()->writeToLog("SceneNode with name [" + entity->getName() + "] already exists, ignoring.");
00103 }

00105 void SceneManager::destroySceneNode(const string& name)
00106 {
00107     if (sceneGraph.find(name) != sceneGraph.end())
00108         destroySceneNode(sceneGraph[name]);
00109     else
00110         Utils::get()->writeToLog("SceneNode with name [" + name + "] does not exists, ignoring.");
00111 }

00113 void SceneManager::destroySceneNode(SceneNode* entity)
00114 {
00115     SceneNode* parent = entity->getParent();
00116     parent->removeChildSceneNodeFromMap(entity);
00117     sceneGraph.erase(entity->getName());
00118     entity->destroyAllChildren();
00119     delete entity;
00120 }

00125         return true;
00126     else
00127         return false;

00130 SceneNode* SceneManager::getSceneNode(const string& name)
00131 {

00133         return sceneGraph[name];
00134     else
00135         Utils::get()->writeToLog("SceneNode with name [" + name + "] does not exists, returning nullSceneNode.");
00136     return NULL;

00139 void SceneManager::renameSceneNode(const string& oldName, const string& newName)
00140 {
00141     SceneNode* tmp = NULL;
00142     if (sceneGraph.find(oldName) != sceneGraph.end())
00143         tmp = sceneGraph[oldName];
00144     else
00145     {
00146         Utils::get()->writeToLog("SceneNode with name [" + oldName + "] does not exists, ignoring.");
00147         return;
00148     }
00149 
00150     if (sceneGraph.find(newName) != sceneGraph.end())
00151     {
00152         Utils::get()->writeToLog("SceneNode with name [" + newName + "] already exists, ignoring.");
00153         return;
00154     }
00155 
00156     SceneNode* tmpParent = tmp->getParent();
00157     tmpParent->removeChildSceneNode(tmp);
00158     sceneGraph.erase(oldName);
00159 
00160     sceneGraph[newName] = tmp;
00161     sceneGraph[newName]->setNameNoRemap(newName);
00162     tmpParent->attachChildSceneNode(tmp);
00163 }

00199 void SceneManager::destroyCamera(Camera* cam, const bool& deleteIfInUse)
00200 {
00201     if (cam != cameras["default"])
00202     {
00203         if (!deleteIfInUse)
00204         {
00205             if (cam->getNumberOfUsers() > 0)
00206                 return;
00207         }
00208 
00209         cam->removeAllUsers();
00210         cameras.erase(cam->getName());
00211         delete cam;
00212     }
00213 }

00216 {

00218     if (cameras.find(oldName) != cameras.end())
00219         cam = cameras[oldName];
00220     else
00221     {
00222         Utils::get()->writeToLog("Camera with name [" + oldName + "] does not exists, ignoring.");
00223         return;
00224     }
00225 
00226     if (cameras.find(newName) != cameras.end())
00227     {
00228         Utils::get()->writeToLog("Camera with name [" + newName + "] already exists, ignoring.");
00229         return;
00230     }
00231 
00232     cam->setNameNoRemap(newName);
00233     cameras.erase(oldName);
00234     cameras[newName] = cam;

00237 void SceneManager::registerComponentType(const string& type, ComponentCreator* creator)
00238 {
00239     if (creators.find(type) != creators.end())
00240         Utils::get()->writeToLog("ComponentCreator with type name [" + type + "] already exists, ignoring.");
00241     else

00245 Component* SceneManager::createComponent(const string& type, const string& name)
00246 {
00247     if (creators.find(type) == creators.end())
00248     {
00249         Utils::get()->writeToLog("ComponentCreator with type name [" + name + "] does not exist, returning NULL.");
00250         return NULL;
00251     }
00252 
00253     if (components.find(name) != components.end())
00254     {
00255         Utils::get()->writeToLog("Component with name [" + name + "] already exists, returning previously existing component.");
00256         return  components[name];
00257     }
00258     else
00259     {
00260         components[name] = creators[type]->createComponent(name);
00261         return components[name];
00262     }
00263 }

00284 Component* SceneManager::copyComponent(const string& newName, Component* const com)
00285 {
00286     if (components.find(newName) != components.end())
00287     {
00288         Utils::get()->writeToLog("Component with name [" + newName + "] already exists, returning previously existing component.");
00289         return components[newName];
00290     }
00291     else
00292     {
00293         components[newName] = creators[com->getType()]->copyComponent(newName, com);
00294         return components[newName];
00295     }
00296 }

00306 void SceneManager::destroyComponent(Component* com, const bool& deleteIfInUse)
00307 {
00308     if (com != NULL)
00309     {
00310         if (!deleteIfInUse)
00311         {
00312             if (com->getNumberOfUsers() > 0)
00313                 return;
00314         }
00315 
00316         components.erase(com->getName());
00317         delete com;
00318     }

00321 void SceneManager::renameComponent(const string& oldName, const string& newName)
00322 {
00323     Component* com = NULL;
00324     if (components.find(oldName) != components.end())
00325         com = components[oldName];
00326     else
00327     {
00328         Utils::get()->writeToLog("Component with name [" + oldName + "] does not exists, ignoring.");
00329         return;
00330     }
00331 
00332     if (components.find(newName) != components.end())
00333     {
00334         Utils::get()->writeToLog("Components with name [" + newName + "] already exists, ignoring.");
00335         return;

00337 
00338     com->setNameNoRemap(newName);
00339     components.erase(oldName);
00340     components[newName] = com;

00343 void SceneManager::clearScene()
00344 {
00345     nullSceneNode->destroyAllChildren();
00346     rootSceneNode->destroyAllChildren();
00347 
00348     while (components.begin() != components.end())
00349         destroyComponent(components.begin()->second, true);
00350     components.clear();
00351 
00352     Camera* defCam = cameras["default"];
00353 
00354     while (cameras.size() > 1)
00355     {
00356         if (cameras.begin()->first != "default")
00357             destroyCamera(cameras.begin()->second, true);
00358     }
00359 
00360     cameras.clear();
00361     cameras["default"] = defCam;
00362 }

00364 void SceneManager::update()
00365 {
00366     list<UpdateListener*>::const_iterator iter;
00367     for (iter = updateListeners.begin(); iter != updateListeners.end(); ++iter)
00368         (*iter)->update();
00369 }

00371 void SceneManager::render()
00372 {
00373     RenderTextureManager::get()->renderTextures();
00374 
00375     list<RenderableListener*>::const_iterator iter;
00376     for (iter = renderListeners.begin(); iter != renderListeners.end(); ++iter)
00377         (*iter)->render();
00378 }

00380 SceneManager* SceneManager::get()
00381 {

00383         scManager = new SceneManager();
